verses.roman:
paugaṇḍa-vayase paḍena, paḍāna śiṣyagaṇe
sarvatra karena kṛṣṇa-nāmera vyākhyāne

synonyms: paugaṇḍa-vayase—in the age of paugaṇḍa; paḍena—studies; paḍāna—teaches; śisya-gaṇe—disciples; sarvatra—everywhere; karena—does; kṛṣṇa-nāmera—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; vyākhyāne—description.
translation: During His paugaṇḍa age He became a serious student and also taught disciples. In this way He used to explain the holy name of Kṛṣṇa everywhere.
